name: Word Capitalization
description:
Capitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter.
Your task is to capitalize the given word. Note, that during capitalization
all the letters except the first one remains unchanged. Input A single line
contains a non-empty word. This word consists of lowercase and uppercase
English letters. The length of the word will not exceed 10^3. Output Output
the given word after capitalization. Examples Input ApPLe Output ApPLe Input
konjac Output Konjac
private_cases:
a
A
A
A
z
Z
ABACABA
ABACABA
P
P
Xyzzy
Xyzzy
Zzz
Zzz
Zp
Zp
